name: Solitaire - The Card Game (itch)
description:
Solitaire - The Card Game

The game that you stack cards on top of cards.

---------------------------------

  • You can play many games at the same time
  • Play anywhere, anytime
  • Stack the cards

The game comes with 2 textures, press 't' to switch them.

You can right click to automatically move a card onto the place-mat.  you can very much win,  it's just that it doesn't do anything.
